attributes.description:
This wonderful piece of machine is a 2011 Mercedes-Benz SL 63 AMG, it is timeless and simply put it as a special vehicle in its own class. Overall the SL63 is the perfect combination of looks, technology, luxury, and performance all mixed together. It comes with power steering, multi-functioning steering, electric seats, armrest, navigation system, electric windows, electric mirrors, front and rear park assists, central locking remote, paddle shifting, harman/Kardon sound system and memory seats. Thank you for choosing Crescent Car Sales. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
